sentences: Ma tean seda teades, et see on õige.
Ta tegi seda teades, et see oli vajalik.
Nende teades, et nad on valemis, otsustasid nad ära öelda.
context: The word 'teades' in Estonian means knowingly or being aware of something. It is commonly used to describe a situation where someone is conscious of the facts or circumstances and acts accordingly.
